title: Conduct Amazon Chime Video Meetings
description: This video shows you how to add video experience to your meetings. Learn more at - http://amzn.to/2rpc2Wj.

title: Amazon Chime Chat Overview
description: This video shows you how to use Amazon Chime chat features. Learn more at - http://amzn.to/2rAxCLG.

title: Join a Meeting with Amazon Chime
description: This video shows you a few ways to join a meeting from the Amazon Chime application. Learn more at http://amzn.to/2rAsWW5.

title: How to Set up an Amazon Chime Account for Your Organization
description:
Creating an Amazon Chime account is easy, and can be done in just a few steps in the AWS Console. This video walks you through how to do so, and how to add and set permissions for your users. To learn more about Amazon Chime, visit https://amzn.to/2xQ3j4j. 

Log in to the Amazon Chime console at https://console.chime.aws.amazon.com/.

title: Amazon Chime SDK Demo and Code Walkthrough
description:
To learn more about Amazon Chime SDK, visit: https://amzn.to/2Xw7qym
The Amazon Chime SDK is a set of real-time communications components that developers can use to quickly add audio calling, video calling, and screen sharing capabilities to their own applications. Developers can leverage the same communication infrastructure and services that power Amazon Chime, an online meetings service from AWS, and deliver engaging experiences in their applications. 

In this video, Giri Kalpathy Narayanan demoes a custom meeting application and walkthroughs through the code to explain how developers can build with the  Amazon Chime SDK.

To learn more about Amazon Chime SDK, visit:
https://amzn.to/2Xwg6oq
To learn more about AWS SDK, visti: https://amzn.to/2s5cfmL 
To check out the Amazon Chime SDK GitHub repo, visit:  http://bit.ly/2KAhCkf 
To review the Amazon Chime SDK Developer Guide, visit: https://amzn.to/35m3B1y 
To review the Amazon Chime API Reference, visit: https://amzn.to/2Ou4zSp

title: Join a Meeting without Amazon Chime
description: This video shows you how to join a meeting if you don’t have the Amazon Chime application installed. Learn more at - http://amzn.to/2szhSb6.

title: Getting started with Amazon Chime Business Calling
description:
Learn more about Amazon Chime at – https://amzn.to/2TGhQMz 
Amazon Chime lets you meet, chat, and place business phone calls inside and outside your organization. This video helps you get started with using Amazon Chime Business Calling.

title: Tips and Tricks for Scheduling an Amazon Chime Meeting
description: This video shows how to create a personalized link, help mobile users join your meetings, and when and how to disable the AutoCall feature. Learn more at - http://amzn.to/2rFpOn2.

title: Install Amazon Chime and Create an Account
description: This video shows you how to install Amazon Chime and create an account. Learn more at - http://amzn.to/2tbMk8V.

title: Change Amazon Chime Settings
description: This video shows you how to change Amazon Chime settings for both mobile and desktop clients. Learn more at - http://amzn.to/2sCizkr.

title: Amazon Chime: Frustration-Free Meetings with Exceptional Audio and Video Quality
description:
Amazon Chime is a modern, secure unified communications service that makes meetings easier and more efficient than ever before. You can use Amazon Chime for online meetings, video conferencing, calls, chat, and to share content, both inside and outside your organization. With easy-to-use apps available for Android, iOS, Mac, and Windows, meetings and chats are always synchronized, you can join meetings from any device, and you can switch seamlessly between devices anytime – even in the middle of a meeting. Amazon Chime is a service offered by Amazon Web Services, where security is the highest priority, so you can feel confident you’re communicating securely.

Learn more about Amazon Chime here - http://amzn.to/2kkqpvi

title: Amazon Chime SDK Introduction
description:
To learn more about Amazon Chime SDK, visit: https://amzn.to/2raxOBX
The Amazon Chime SDK is a set of real-time communications components that developers can use to quickly add audio calling, video calling, and screen sharing capabilities to their own applications. Developers can leverage the same communication infrastructure and services that power Amazon Chime, an online meetings service from AWS, and deliver engaging experiences in their applications. 

In this video, Aaron Friedman (Principal Product Manager, Amazon Chime) introduces the use cases and benefits of the Amazon Chime SDK.

title: Navigate an Amazon Chime Meeting
description: This video shows you how to navigate a meeting using the Amazon Chime meeting features. Learn more at - http://amzn.to/2sCaCfg.

title: Screen Share & Remote Control with Amazon Chime
description: This video shows you how to share your screen or request remote access during an Amazon Chime meeting. Learn more at - http://amzn.to/2tbQttH.

title: Using Amazon Chime Event Mode
description: This video shows you how to use Amazon Chime in a meeting where you need to minimize interruption or background noise. Learn more at - http://amzn.to/2rAFn40.

title: Getting Started with Amazon Chime Voice Connector
description:
Learn more about Amazon Chime at – https://amzn.to/2HkBFTG 
Amazon Chime Voice Connector is a service that carries your voice traffic over the internet and elastically scales to meet your capacity needs. This video helps you get started with using Amazon Chime Voice Connector.

title: Schedule an Amazon Chime Meeting with Microsoft Outlook on Windows
description: If you are using Microsoft Outlook on Windows, this video shows you how to schedule Amazon Chime meetings. Learn more at http://amzn.to/2rp6kU7.

title: Control Background Noise During Amazon Chime Meetings
description: This video explains how the visual roster shows who is making background noise, and how you can mute them. Learn more at - http://amzn.to/2saLdI3.

title: Amazon Chime SDK Overview
description:
To learn more about Amazon Chime SDK, visit: https://amzn.to/33bueow
The Amazon Chime SDK is a set of real-time communications components that developers can use to quickly add audio calling, video calling, and screen sharing capabilities to their own applications. Developers can leverage the same communication infrastructure and services that power Amazon Chime, an online meetings service from AWS, and deliver engaging experiences in their applications.

In this video, Aaron Friedman (Principal Product Manager, Amazon Chime) covers a high-level overview of the Amazon Chime SDK operation.

title: Amazon Chime Pay-As-You-Go Pricing Explained
description:
Learn about Amazon Chime pay-as-you-go pricing with no upfront fees, commitments, or long-term contracts.

Learn more about pricing at - https://amzn.to/2LPE0VQ or sign up for a free 30-day trial at - https://amzn.to/2Jk73Ck.

title: Amazon Chime Chat Rooms
description: This video shows you how to use Amazon Chime chat room features. Learn more at - http://amzn.to/2rAMaLg.

title: Join an Amazon Chime Meeting Early
description: This video shows you how to join an Amazon Chime meeting early when you want to be ahead of schedule. Learn more at http://amzn.to/2saH9rt.

title: Amazon Chime Launches Usage-Based Pricing
description:
Learn more about Amazon Chime Pricing at - http://amzn.to/2Fssa0a.
Amazon Chime now provides usage-based pricing ensuring you only pay for the services that you consume. Most communication products and services come with complicated service agreements and billing terms. Amazon Chime delivers frustration-free meetings and messaging, and now we are adding frustration-free pricing to deliver effortless cost savings no matter the size of your company or organization.

title: Record Amazon Chime Meetings
description: This video shows you how to record your meetings. Learn more at - http://amzn.to/2rFB0Qj.

title: Connexity on Amazon Chime - Success Story
description:
Learn more about Amazon Chime at – https://amzn.to/2J5DrK7 
Connexity the largest independent retail product listing platform, helping merchants reach over 30 million shoppers uses Amazon Chime to ensure all their meetings start on time. By using Amazon Chime as their communications platform, Connexity his simplified their user administration tasks, and taken advantage of Amazon Chime's flexible pay per use pricing model. This has allowed Connexity to use any Amazon Chime feature they need and only pay for what they use, on the days they use it.

title: Join an Amazon Chime Meeting with In-Room Conference Video
description: This video shows you how to use a video conference system to join an Amazon Chime meeting. Learn more at - http://amzn.to/2skTQyb.

title: Schedule an Amazon Chime Meeting for Someone Else with Microsoft Outlook on Windows
description: If you are using Microsoft Outlook on Windows, this video shows you how to give other users delegate status to enable them to schedule meetings on your behalf. Learn more at - http://amzn.to/2sIrUag.

title: Amazon Chime: Frustration-Free Meetings with Exceptional Audio and Video Quality
description:
To learn more about Amazon Chime and start a free 30 day trial, visit http://amzn.to/2kkqpvi.
Amazon Chime is a modern, secure unified communications service that makes meetings easier and more efficient than ever before. Learn more about Amazon Chime, and how Brooks Brothers was able to retire their legacy meetings solutions and standardize on Amazon Chime. Hear from Level 3 Communications and Vonage, launch partners for Amazon Chime, about why they're including Amazon Chime in their service offerings.

title: Rejoin an Amazon Chime Meeting
description: This video shows you how Amazon Chime tries to reconnect you if your connection drops during a meeting. Learn more at - http://amzn.to/2satgt8.

By using Amazon Chime as their communications platform, Connexity his simplified their user administration tasks, and taken advantage of Amazon Chime's flexible pay per use pricing model. This has allowed Connexity to use any Amazon Chime feature they need and only pay for what they use, on the days they use it.

title: Brooks Brothers on Amazon Chime - Success Story
description:
Visit http://amzn.to/2EWz14X to learn more about AWS.
Learn how Brooks Brothers, America’s oldest clothing retailer, simplified their end-user communication process with frustration free and effortless meetings. By using Amazon Chime as their communications platform, Brooks Brothers now has a single application for online meetings, calls, and chat, available on all their devices.
